price: គេ(នួហ)នេះមិនមែនជាអ្វីក្រៅពីបុរសដែលមានរោគ វិកលចរិតឡើយ។ ដូចេ្នះ ចូរពួកអ្នករង់ចាំមើលគេមួយរយៈកាល សិនចុះ។
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbaṣū bihi ḥattā ḥīnin
